speaker: Aish Srinivas
title: A Sh!tshow - The Regrettably Relatable Retrospective
description:
To err is human, to learn, divine. 

Each and every one of us can think of a project that should have earned us a feature on our local firefighters calendar. But how are we meant to learn and grow if everything goes swimmingly? Luckily, one of the cornerstones of the Agile Manifesto gives us some guidance on learning from mistakes: 
\
